answers.answer: No, upper leg stiffness and pain is not normal for diabetes. See my answer to the post "Leg Pain by coopey" below. Have you spoken/seen your doctor lately?

question: I am a type II with an AC1 that averges around 6.1  I take metformin 500mg twice a day.  IS upper leg stiffness and pain a normal side effect for a type II diabetic.
title: upper leg stiffness and pain
